_source.short_desc: Classy is a giving experience platform that enables nonprofits to connect with supporters through online fundraising.
_source.long_desc: Classy is a B Corp Certified social enterprise that helps nonprofit organizations maximize their impact through a suite of world-class, online fundraising tools to accelerate social impact around the world. From crowdfunding to peer-to-peer fundraising, event registration and management, and one-time or recurring donations, nonprofits of all sizes trust Classy to manage all of their online fundraising. Since 2011, Classy has powered tens of millions of donations and helped raise over $3 billion.
_source.target_audience: Classy works with all 501-c3 certified nonprofit organizations. Our software helps nonprofits grow their online fundraising, mobilize communities, and better engage supporters.

media.caption: Website Donations: Collect one-time or recurring donations through a completely branded, mobile-responsive web page or direct appeal.
Peer-to-Peer: Mobilize your supporters and give them the tools to fundraise on your behalf.
Online Registration and Ticketing: Power events of any size and location with an event fundraising platform that unites donors around a customized experience.
Recurring Giving: You need funding you can depend on. Build a community of reliable, recurring support for your mission.
Online Donor Management and Reporting: Classy Manager ? your central hub for campaign and supporter management.

category_features.name: Alumni Management
category_features.definition: Provides educational institutions and other fundraising organizations with tools to cultivate and stay connected with alumni.

category_features.name: Auction Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to create and manage auctions.

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Donor Discovery
category_features.definition: Search 3rd party databases to identify potential donors

category_features.name: Donor Management
category_features.definition: Track and maintain donor relationships throughout various stages/activities including contact information and previous outreach

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Gift Matching Management
category_features.definition: Ability to match gifts through the system

category_features.name: Grant Management
category_features.definition: Monitor application statuses, proposals and award funds

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Giving
category_features.definition: Ability to make a donation from a mobile device/app

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Pledge Management
category_features.definition: Track commitments to donate in the future

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

related_products.short_desc: Bloomerang's donor management software helps fundraisers save more time, raise more funds, and do more good.
related_products.features:
Bloomerang helps nonprofits deliver a better giving experience so they can save time, raise more funds, and create lasting change. With our donor management software, you'll have access to: 

- Email Marketing Tools
- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub
- Online Giving Pages & Forms
- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

related_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect empowers your team to work together, raise more money, and cultivate relationships that keep your mission moving forward.
related_products.features: Nonprofits raise 20% more funds in their first year using DonorPerfect. It's the most comprehensive solution in fundraising. Manage donations, contacts, receipting, reporting, email, and fundraising initiatives from a single system. With automatic monthly giving, integrated online donation forms, standard and custom reports, Constant Contact email, auction management, and a network of integrated partner solutions, DonorPerfect is ideal for organizations of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: With QuickBooks Online Advanced you can organize your books, complete tasks that matter faster with automated approvals and reminders, and stay on top of your cash flow. With the revenue streams dashboard, you can understand which fundraisers and donors are strongest and which need help. You can also create board-ready presentations intuitively. With 24/7 premium care, get the support you need.

related_products.short_desc: Church management software with membership, contributions, attendance, visitation, picture/portrait, and more.
related_products.features:
Too many programs make fund-raising complicated. Fund-raising should be fun, simple, and easily managed.  If people want to know where they are with their giving and how much they owe, this should be a simple thing to report.  Servant Keeper makes it so easy!

Join the 30,000+ non-profits that have discovered the secret to simplifying fund-raising while increasing donations.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
related_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

related_products.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days and year-round giving. Experience the JOY of fundraising with GiveGab!
related_products.features:
GiveGab is becoming Bonterra. Learn more at www.bonterratech.com.

GiveGab is the #1 digital solution for Giving Days and year-round fundraising tailored to nonprofit networks, community foundations, education institutions, hospital foundations, and public media outlets. GiveGab provides a modern and secure platform built on technology inspired by the feedback of our customers, resulting in products and features tailored to the most popular requests of our partners.

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Fundraising solution that helps you communicate with your constituents and make better decisions.
related_products.features: Raisers Edge NXT is a smart, cloud fundraising solution built to help nonprofits achieve sustainable growth. It's a total solution that includes all the tools needed to be successful on one platform and one simple subscription price. This includes data enrichment services, event management, and social and email marketing tools, online donations, flexible reporting and actionable analytics.  Raisers Edge NXT pulls together your processes and people to move your entire mission forward.

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for charitable fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simplify every aspect of running your charitable event!  Sell tickets, Online, Mobile and paper-based bidding options. Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more.  Simple, affordable and powerful event management software for any charitable organization including Schools, Churches, Community Service Organizations.  Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

related_products.short_desc: Online donation platform & fundraising software for nonprofits. Includes donation forms, mass email, SMS, QB integration, and more.
related_products.features: Discover why thousands of nonprofits have trusted DonorSnap for over a decade. DonorSnap is an all-in-one fundraising software for nonprofits. Save countless administrative hours with time-saving tools and integrations. Take your fundraising to the next level with robust reporting and communication tools. Pricing starts at $39 per month. Try DonorSnap with your own data risk-free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: EveryAction - a unified nonprofit CRM solution built to increase efficiency, optimize multichannel fundraising, & advance your mission.
similar_products.features: Get more from and do more with your donor data. EveryAction's unified CRM and nonprofit fundraising software gives you a 360-degree view of your donors, empowering you to run automated, personalized, omni-channel fundraising campaigns by managing online and offline fundraising from the same, powerful platform. With best-in-class fundraising, membership, advocacy and analytics tools built and supported by nonprofit experts, EveryAction enables organizations of all sizes to advance their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: GradAdvance by Graduway is the leading digital fundraising solution to manage giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns.
similar_products.features: GradAdvance by Graduway is a leading provider of digital fundraising solutions. Proven to be effective for giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns, Graduway's full suite of tools enhance your efforts for more impactful outcomes, attracting more donors and raising more dollars.

similar_products.short_desc: Eleo is designed with new and seasoned fundraisers in mind.
similar_products.features:
Eleo is designed for new and seasoned fundraisers. Complete with every feature, integration, and report you need to build strong relationships with your donors. Send effective communications and analyze your fundraising efforts.  Eleo comes equipped with event, volunteer, membership and grant modules.

Pricing starts at $39/month for up to 2,500 contacts and includes live support, trainings, data import, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
similar_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

similar_products.short_desc: Givebutter is a free fundraising platform bringing together everything changemakers need to successfully raise funds for good causes.
similar_products.features: Givebutter is the #1 rated fundraising platform on G2, powering $300m+ in donations for more than a million changemakers worldwide. Nonprofits use Givebutter to replace multiple categories of tools, including donation forms, fundraisers, events, donor management (CRM), email, texting, and more. Instead of charging a traditional SaaS subscription fee, Givebutter is completely free to use with a 100% transparent tip-or-fee model. Givebutter has been certified as a Great Place to Work in 2022.

similar_products.short_desc: Fundraising Software offering: Online Giving | Virtual Fundraising | Peer-to-Peer | Event Management | Text2Give | Tributes & Memorials
similar_products.features:
OneCause fundraising software offers an intuitive, reliable and affordable solution. Providing the ability to manage multiple live or virtual fundraisers annually allowing any-sized organization to connect more donors to your cause.

Software offers: online giving | virtual fundraising | streaming video | peer-to-peer | tributes & memorial gifts | giving days | run, walk, rides | event management | online auctions & mobile bidding | reporting & analytics | online, phone & email support.

similar_products.short_desc:
Funraise provides digital fundraising tech to build your nonprofit's movement & make enterprise-size impact. 

Get started for Free!
similar_products.features:
Funraise provides exceptional, friendly digital fundraising technology. Built with innovation and nonprofit experience, Funraise's state-of-the-art fundraising tools integrate every critical aspect of fundraising management into a single platform, making it fun to create lasting impact with nonprofit-first technology. Experience why organizations like United Nations HCR and National Wildlife Federation trust Funraise to power their fundraising. 

Because your cause is our cause.

Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more. Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

similar_products.short_desc: We offer a true all-in-one solution! Try our complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting system for free.
similar_products.features: Nonprofits love Continue To Give because we offer a true all-in-one solution! We have the complete Online Giving, Donor Management, and Fund Accounting in one.  You'll raise more money with our Text, Mobile, App, Website, Social, and Peer to Peer Fundraising options. Plus, you are able to sell event tickets, build meaningful relationships, and more with our Donor Management System. Then, to top it off, you can drop your accounting software, because we built that too! Switch today and Save!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: campaign_management contribution_tracking donor_management event_management gift_matching_management membership_management mobile_giving payment_processing pledge_management recurring_giving
